post:
WebHorizon: Get a VPS in Japan or Singapore for Less Than $11/Year!

cheap vps, japan, openvz, singapore, tokyo, webhorizon September 11, 2021 @ 12:00 pm, by raindog308

WebHorizon is expanding into Japan and they’ve got a great offer for us:

  • Get a VPS in Japan for only $10.56/year!
  • Get a 2GB VPS for only $44/year!
  • Same pricing available in Singapore!

This is outstanding pricing for a cheap VPS in Asia.

We last had WebHorizon back in August when they launched their NatVPS brand.

They are registered in India. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept PayPal, Cards via Stripe, Crypto payments (BTC, BCH, XMR etc.) and RazorPay(INR pymts.).

Here’s a little about WebHorizon in their own words:

“WebHorizon has been providing web hosting and VPS services since 2019.
We aim 100% customer satisfaction & 24 hours money-back policy :)
Recently we launched our 3rd Major location in APAC region – Tokyo, Japan. 🇯🇵”

Features:
  • All plans are OpenVZ7 based.
  • Full docker support.
  • TUN / TAP / FUSE Supported.
  • rDNS supported.
  • Additional IPs available.
  • Free backups/snapshots from panel (best-effort)
  • Remember that the LEB community would love to hear about your experience in the comments section below!

Now read more to see the offers!

  • 256MB ECC RAM
  • 1 CPU Core(s)
  • 5 GB NVMe/SSD Disk
  • 1 IPv4 + /64 IPv6
  • 200 GB Premium Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps per month
  • coupon = Japan-prelaunch
